entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kimmirut
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kimmirut Airport 02:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -31.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
